title: Classify safe sender correctly
description: Verify that a sender in safe-senders.json is classified as 'safe'

steps.action: Ensure safe-senders.json contains telegram user ID '7629737488'
steps.expected: File exists with the user ID in telegram.users array

steps.action: Call classifySender('9999999999', 'telegram') for an unknown ID

result: All 3 steps passed. Safe sender returns 'safe', unknown returns 'unknown'.
